Character.Description: A composed, intelligent middle-aged woman with a calm authority and understated confidence; articulate, grounded, and observant.

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, full bust
Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, balanced proportions

Face.Makeup: Clean, professional makeup; neutral eyes, soft contour, muted lipstick

Hair.Style: Neatly styled, soft waves or smooth blowout, controlled movement

Base.Item: Tailored tops, blouses, or knit sweaters
Base.Material: Wool blends, fine knits, matte fabrics

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, architectural visualization quality

Lighting.Shadows: Crisp and defined, minimal but purposeful

ColorPalette.Treatment: Clean and balanced, neutral base with subtle warmth from wood and leather, professional restraint

Situation.Name: Portrait
Situation.Setting: Executive boardroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and city skyline view
Situation.Camera: Medium close-up, three-quarter view, shallow depth of field

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing at head of table, natural authority
CharacterPose.Gesture: Arms at sides or gesturing while speaking

Environment.Name: City skyline
Environment.Description: Modern city visible through large windows

Situation.LightingFocus: Clean professional lighting with soft window backlight
